title: 我愛havana，但是我再也回不去了
contents:
昨天才意識到camila cabello居然還真的出生在havana，我一直以為她是英國人。。。。。

起碼現在我是這麼看這首歌，papa把我從havana帶走，因為他討厭古巴共產黨政府。  雖然我只是認識它很短的時間，我愛havana，但是我再也回不去了。   

因為歌詞裡面有papa says he got malo in him，話說這段歌詞真的很喜歡。  不過我也一直就是，為什麼加個papa進love song裡面。   現在看到她老兄居然還真的在havan出生，歌詞很多地方就說的通了。    反正這首歌，突然就很共鳴了，

原歌詞

Hey
Havana, ooh na-na (ay)
Half of my heart is in Havana, ooh-na-na (ay, ay)
He took me back to East Atlanta, na-na-na
Oh, but my heart is in Havana (ay)
There's somethin' 'bout his manners (uh huh)
Havana, ooh na-na (uh)
He didn't walk up with that "how you doin'?" (uh)
(When he came in the room)
He said there's a lot of girls I can do with (uh)
(But I can't without you)
I knew him forever in a minute (hey)
(That summer night in June)
And papa says he got malo in him (uh)
He got me feelin' like
Ooh-ooh-ooh, I knew it when I met him
I loved him when I left him
Got me feelin' like
Ooh-ooh-ooh, and then I had to tell him
I had to go, oh na-na-na-na-na
Havana, ooh na-na (ay, ay)
Half of my heart is in Havana, ooh-na-na (ay, ay)
He took…
